title: Dear AST SpaceMobile Stock Fans, Mark Your Calendars for December 15
description: AST SpaceMobile shares are rallying in the build-up to BlueBird 6 launch on Dec. 15. Here’s what makes ASTS stock an exciting investment for the long-term.
content:
AST SpaceMobile (ASTS) stock is up nearly 20% today amid renewed excitement around the upcoming launch of its next-generation satellite, BlueBird 6.
